title: Add share option for daily affirmations

requirements.text: Add a share button to the daily affirmations display that allows users to share the current day's affirmation message

quotes: Can we add a share option for ppl to share out the days affirmations?

acceptanceCriteria: A share button is visible on the daily affirmation card
Clicking the share button triggers a native share dialog (Web Share API) if available
The shared content includes the full affirmation text
If Web Share API is not available, provide a fallback to copy the affirmation to clipboard
User receives visual feedback when sharing is successful or when text is copied

requirements.text: Format the shared affirmation message to include attribution indicating it came from the Daily Affirmations app
acceptanceCriteria: Shared message includes the affirmation text followed by a subtle attribution line
Attribution maintains a consistent format across all shares
The format is user-friendly and appropriate for social media sharing

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or add new backend endpoints
Use the existing daily message data from the useDailyMessage hook
Maintain consistency with the existing card-based UI design
Do not change frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
nonGoals: Direct integration with specific social media platforms
Customizing the shared message format per platform
Sharing streak information or mood check-in data
